document_data.name: Dermin Courtierdale
document_data.mainbody: '''Dermin Courtierdale''' was a famous [[Harper]] master who operated out of [[Amn]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationship:
Dermin tutored many young Harpers, including the [[druid]] [[Jaheira]], who he had originally recruited into the organization.

He was a member of the [[Athkatla]]n Harpers, who operated out of a luxurious estate near the city's docks. His associates included [[Galvarey]], [[Berinvar]], [[Rylock]], among others.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Dermin, Galvarey and other Athkatlan Harpers were conducting themselves in a manner quite out of line with the greater organization. They lived a lavish life at Galvarey's estate, and resorted to murdering those they perceived as their enemies.
